Pre-Game Insights: Group C play at the 2024 UEFA European Championship is coming to an end, with Denmark, sitting on two points, and Serbia, with one, set to collide on Tuesday, June 25 at 3:00 PM ET.
In two matches for Denmark in UEFA Euro, Victor Kristiansen has one assist but no goals.
In UEFA Euro (two matches), Denmark’s Jonas Wind has one assist (third in the 2024 UEFA European Championship).
In UEFA European Championship play, Morten Hjulmand has been involved in two matches for Denmark, and has one goal.
In its UEFA European Championship campaign (two matches), Denmark’s Christian Dannemann Eriksen has one goal.
In two matches for Serbia in UEFA European Championship play, Ivan Ilic has not scored but has one assist.
In UEFA European Championship play (two appearances), Luka Jovic has one goal (fifth in UEFA European Championship play) for Serbia.
